input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: AITeacher is a smart assistant that helps students succeed in school.

Tone: catchy, engaging
sentences: AITeacher is the smartest assistant for students! It helps you succeed in school by providing personalized learning recommendations and tools.

AITeacher is the perfect assistant for students who want to succeed in school. With this app, they can get help with their homework, track their progress, and learn new skills. AITeacher is the perfect tool for students who want to get ahead!
AITeacher is the smartest assistant for students! This app will help you succeed in school by providing homework help, tutoring, and more. AITeacher is the perfect tool for students of all ages.
